description: A basic jump without using hands, the foundation of most tricks.
A trick where the board flips 360° along its axis using the front foot.
A trick where the board spins 180° without flipping, using a scooping motion.
Similar to a kickflip but the board flips in the opposite direction using the heel.
A 360 flip where the board spins 360° while also flipping.
A basic trick where the board spins 180° without flipping, using the back foot.
A 180° spin where the rider turns to face the front, while the board also spins 180°.
A 180° spin where the rider turns to face the back, while the board also spins 180°.
A 360° spin of the board while the rider spins 180° in the opposite direction.
A trick similar to the ollie, but performed with the front foot pushing down on the nose of the board.
A combination of a 360° flip and a 360° shove-it, where the board spins and flips simultaneously.
A trick where the board does a kickflip while simultaneously spinning 180°.
A flip trick where the board flips inward while also performing a 180° spin.
A combination of a bigspin and a flip, where the board spins 360° while flipping.
A flip trick performed while rolling in nollie, where the rider flicks the board with the front foot.
A flip trick where the board performs a kickflip while spinning 180° in the horizontal direction.
A flip trick where the board flips two times in the air before landing.
